name: Kaisuo
description:
Kaisuo is a single-player puzzle game about opening Chinese puzzle boxes that unlock surreal worlds. Journey through a strange landscape and discover new uses to old things. Slide open panels, discover secret compartments and change the way you see the world.

Explore a gorgeous and mysterious world through 360° gameplay. Use the Oculus Touch controllers to precisely interact with the world via complex items and tools that deliver fine haptic feedback and move the world at your finger tips.
